title: High Learning Poverty Among Male Students
description: In 2019, 98.13% of male students in Laos were below the minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary school, indicating a high level of learning poverty.

title: High Learning Poverty Among Female Students
description: In 2019, 97.01% of female students in Laos were below the minimum reading proficiency at the end of primary school, showing significant challenges in education.

title: High Adequacy of Social Protection Programs
description: In 2018, social protection and labor programs in Laos accounted for 90.86% of the total welfare of beneficiary households, indicating strong support systems.
